description:
A simple and intuitive public transit application for the MBTA in Boston.

Currently the following MBTA bus & rail lines are supported:
- all bus lines are supported
- Blue, Orange and Red Line is supported
(Green Line is not supported yet, MBTA does not provide prediction data for this line yet.)
- Commuter rail not supported yet

Get arrival times based on actual vehicle locations (powered by Nextbus)
Find the stops closest to you
Save your favorite stops for quickest access
View map locations of routes, stops and vehicles

Whats new in this version:
- changed the color of prediction times to be more readable in daylight
- some small bug fixes in alerts and memory leaks
- Pre3 screen resolution now fully supported

You need a active internet connection (WiFi, 3G or Edge) to use Track My Transit.  Track My Transit will not work without a active internet connection.

NOTE: Locations of vehicles are not supported for every line. This will not affect the accuracy of arrival times.
